where: 1st Workshop on Statistical and Machine Learning Approaches Applied to Architectures and Compilation (SMART'07), colocated with HiPEAC 2007 conference
title: Building a Practical Iterative Interactive Compiler

notes.note: In this paper $#cm_cv_i2#$ introduced a novel concept to convert hardwired blackboxed production compilers into interactive research toolsets [$#cm_e84a25bcb528c798_cb454fa89115879a#$]
Now available in mainline GCC since version 4.6 [$#cm_c47ad9a552aa7e82_0dd07d427c84c0f6#$]
